apple_vendor_description: The people holding hands emoji on Apple devices showcases two individuals with medium skin tone and medium-dark skin tone, their hands clasped in a gesture of unity and support. Apple's design language imbues this emoji with smooth gradients and polished textures, highlighting the subtle curves of their fingers and the comforting connection they share. It visually communicates partnership, friendship, and solidarity, offering a direct and heartfelt way to express a strong bond between people on Apple devices.
